Bio

Hi! Welcome to my About Me Page. My name is Victor Bialek and I'm a software developer. I currently work for CADENAS GmbH and handle some Backend and Frontend things.

I also do some side projects for myself and my friends. Maybe check out my work. I'll keep updating this page, when I do more interesting things.

Software Developer

My longest software development job to date. It's the one I'm currently employed at. I learned much here and the people are great. I learned Web Development here and made much progress on my Java and C++ programming skills, though to an awesome tech lead I work under.

Receptionist
